attributes.action: The public should vote on whether sun dimming experiments are allowed in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Sun dimming experiments should be discussed in Parliament and the decision on on whether said experiments should be given the go ahead much be put to the public as a vote. Sum dimming experiments have the potential to go very very wrong and firstly we dont have a body to regulate these experiments let alone knowing what the people of this country want. This is too big a decision to be left in the hands of billionaires and academics.
attributes.background: News of Sun dimming experiments being allowed to happen with zero discussion between academia and the public is a huge problem. Neither academia or government should be allowed to perform such potentially world changing experiments without the public being allowed to vote on this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
